Detailed Description

Callback functions for menu items.

Basically, all member functions are slots called by the Menu4D's items.
Most of these slots must translate a parameter-less call to a state change in the associated C4DView.

Todo:
Rework the member functions so that they work with a generic UI::View object instead of an explicitly specified C4DView.
